title: Introducing AG Charts Enterprise
description: Learn about the background of AG Charts, how we arrived where we are today, and what you can expect from our brand-new enterprise product.

title: Whats New in AG Grid 31.2
description: What's New in AG Grid 31.2 - Updated Integrated Enterprise Charts Menu, Tooltips for truncated text, Export to Excel Table, Material Dark Theme

title: What's New in AG Charts 9.2
description: What's New in AG Charts 9.2 - New Map Series types - geographic, lines and markers series, Rounded Corners for all Bar Series types

title: AG Grid: A look back on 2023
description: A look back on 2023, reflecting on our achievements and to thank our community for their unwavering support
